headline: Enterprise Financial Services Corp Announces Appointment of Lars C. Anderson to Board of Directors
summary: ST. LOUIS, August 14, 2025--Enterprise Financial Services Corp (Nasdaq: EFSC) today announced the appointment of Lars C. Anderson as director of Enterprise Financial Services Corp (the "Company") and its wholly owned subsidiary, Enterprise Bank & Trust, effective immediately. In accordance with the Company’s Amended and Restated Bylaws, the size of the Board will be increased from eleven (11) to twelve (12).
